lead_paragraph: The confrontation between the author Buzz Bissinger and the sports blogger Will Leitch symbolized the fear and hatred between mainstream media and the blogosphere.
snippet: The confrontation between the author Buzz Bissinger and the sports blogger Will Leitch symbolized the fear and hatred between mainstream media and the blogosphere.
